PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09802019-07-01,  CH,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of CLAIRE ANDERSON of Whitehorse, Yukon, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; designates CLAIRE ANDERSON for the British Columbia/Yukon region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of the Act, effective August 26, 2019.
AttachmentsAttachment
